# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product not only stands as a testament to quality but also comes with a range of features that make it an exceptional choice for those looking to enhance their experience. Given its unique value proposition, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $180. Should you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
